TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRowSetMetaData implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Sql.IResultSetMetaData, class Java.Sql.IWrapper, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: An interface which provides facilities for getting information about the columns in a RowSet.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetAutoIncrement (int columnIndex, bool autoIncrement);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetAutoIncrement(int32 columnIndex, bool autoIncrement) cil managed

Docs.param: the index number for the column; the first column's index is 1.
true to set automatic numbering on, false to turn it off (default).
Docs.summary: Sets automatic numbering for a specified column in the RowSet.
Docs.exception: if a problem occurs accessing the database.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetNullable (int columnIndex, int nullability);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetNullable(int32 columnIndex, int32 nullability) cil managed

Docs.param: the index number for the column; the first column's index is 1.

an integer which is one of the following values:
ResultSetMetaData.columnNoNulls
ResultSetMetaData.columnNullable
ResultSetMetaData.columnNullableUnknown
The default value is ResultSetMetaData.columnNullableUnknown.
Docs.summary: Sets whether a specified column can contain SQL NULL values.
Docs.exception: if a problem occurs accessing the database.
